```{r}
df <- list.files('data/py', full.names = TRUE) %>% 
    map(read_csv) %>% 
    reduce(rbind)
```

```{r}
df <- df %>% 
    rename(lambda = beta, u = mean_opinion, x = tension) 
```

# Exact relationship between x and modularity

```{r}

df %>% 
    group_by(alpha, lambda, c) %>% 
    filter(abs(u - .5) < .02) %>% 
    summarise(x = mean(x),
              mod = mean(mod)) %>%
    ggplot() + 
    aes(x = x, y = mod, color = alpha) + 
    facet_grid(~c) + 
    geom_point() + 
    geom_abline(aes(slope = -1, intercept = .5))
    

```
